## ChannelSetter type

Color channel setter. Takes current full pixel value and 0-based channel value to set (regardless of shift/bit position). Returns updated pixel value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ChannelSetter<T> = Fn2<T, number, T>;
```
